like

when do you push the envelope

you've got a you've got a company you've
got a business going on and your sales
for this month or maybe $30,000 okay but
now when I want to push the envelope I
want to move beyond the current limits
so maybe my business was using you know

maybe using a certain number of

current limits I want to get more profit
by doing something extra I you know I
did so much but now I want to do more to

the current limits in other words I
could say that I'm really squeezing all
